name: open311-api
description: node version of the open311 api

scripts.test: cd build && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha test/ --timeout 30000 --reporter spec --bail test/
scripts.migrate:test: cd build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize --config config.default.json --env test db:migrate
scripts.migrate:test:undo: cd build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize --config config.default.json --env test db:migrate:undo
scripts.migrate:development: cd build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize --config config.json --env development db:migrate
scripts.migrate: cd build && node_modules/.bin/sequelize --config config.json --env production db:migrate
